00071 #define orxMIN(A, B)              (((A) > (B)) ? (B) : (A))

00078 #define orxMAX(A, B)              (((A) < (B)) ? (B) : (A))

00086 #define orxCLAMP(V, MIN, MAX)     orxMAX(orxMIN(V, MAX), MIN)
00087 
00094 #define orxCIRCULAR_CLAMP_INC_MIN(V, MIN, MAX)  \
00095 do                                              \
00096 {                                               \
00097   while((V) < (MIN))                            \
00098   {                                             \
00099     (V) += ((MAX) - (MIN));                     \
00100   }                                             \
00101   while((V) >= (MAX))                           \
00102   {                                             \
00103     (V) -= ((MAX) - (MIN));                     \
00104   }                                             \
00105 } while(orxFALSE)
00106 
00113 #define orxCIRCULAR_CLAMP_INC_MAX(V, MIN, MAX)  \
00114 do                                              \
00115 {                                               \
00116   while((V) <= (MIN))                           \
00117   {                                             \
00118     (V) += ((MAX) - (MIN));                     \
00119   }                                             \
00120   while((V) > (MAX))                            \
00121   {                                             \
00122     (V) -= ((MAX) - (MIN));                     \
00123   }                                             \
00124 } while(orxFALSE)

00186 static orxINLINE orxU32 orxMath_GetBitCount(orxU32 _u32Value)
00187 {
00188   _u32Value -= ((_u32Value >> 1) & 0x55555555);
00189   _u32Value = (((_u32Value >> 2) & 0x33333333) + (_u32Value & 0x33333333));
00190   _u32Value = (((_u32Value >> 4) + _u32Value) & 0x0f0f0f0f);
00191   _u32Value += (_u32Value >> 8);
00192   _u32Value += (_u32Value >> 16);
00193   return(_u32Value & 0x0000003f);
00194 }
00195 
00200 static orxINLINE orxU32 orxMath_GetTrailingZeroCount(orxU32 _u32Value)
00201 {
00202   /* De Bruijn multiply look up table */
00203   static const orxU32 sau32DeBruijnLUT[32] = 
00204   {
00205     0, 1, 28, 2, 29, 14, 24, 3, 30, 22, 20, 15, 25, 17, 4, 8, 
00206     31, 27, 13, 23, 21, 19, 16, 7, 26, 12, 18, 6, 11, 5, 10, 9
00207   };
00208 
00209   /* Done! */
00210   return sau32DeBruijnLUT[((orxU32)(((orxS32)_u32Value & -(orxS32)_u32Value) * 0x077CB531U)) >> 27];
00211 }
00212 
00217 static orxINLINE orxU32 orxMath_GetNextPowerOfTwo(orxU32 _u32Value)
00218 {
00219   orxU32 u32Result;
00220 
00221   /* Non-zero? */
00222   if(_u32Value != 0)
00223   {
00224     /* Updates result */
00225     u32Result = _u32Value - 1;
00226     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 1);
00227     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 2);
00228     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 4);
00229     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 8);
00230     u32Result = u32Result | (u32Result >> 16);
00231     u32Result++;
00232   }
00233   else
00234   {
00235     /* Updates result */
00236     u32Result = 1;
00237   }
00238   
00239   /* Done! */
00240   return u32Result;
00241 }

00263 {
00264   register orxFLOAT fResult;
00265 
00266 #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00267 
00268   /* Updates result */
00269   fResult = cosf(_fOp);

00272 
00273   /* Updates result */
00274   fResult = cosf(_fOp);
00275 
00276 #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00277 
00278   /* Done! */
00279   return fResult;
00280 }

00464 static orxINLINE orxFLOAT    orxMath_Round(orxFLOAT _fOp)
00465 {
00466   register orxFLOAT fResult;
00467 
00468 #ifdef __orxMSVC__
00469 
00470   /* Updates result */
00471   fResult = (fmodf(_fOp, orxFLOAT_1) >= orx2F(0.5f)) ? ceilf(_fOp) : floorf(_fOp);
00472 
00473 #else /* __orxMSVC__ */
00474 
00475   /* Updates result */
00476   fResult = rintf(_fOp);
00477 
00478 #endif /* __orxMSVC__ */
00479 
00480   /* Done! */
00481   return fResult;
00482 }
